title: PHOTOS: Ronaldo spotted late-night with rumoured new girlfriend
text:
Sports News | 10 October 2015 19:40 CET PHOTOS: Ronaldo spotted late-night with rumoured new girlfriend - www.allsports.com.gh 
They met just under a month ago.But it seems that things are hotting up between footballer Cristiano Ronaldo, 30, and his rumoured new girlfriend Claudia Sanchez, 23. 
The pair were spotted on what appears to be a romantic late-night date in Madrid, Spain, recently. 
Cristiano looked very dapper indeed in a white shirt and skinny black tie, worn with black trousers and patent brogue shoes. 
Spanish model Claudia donned a slinky LBD, her brunette tresses swept to one side which displayed her stunning gold earrings. 
The Portugese striker met the brunette beauty four weeks ago at his perfume launch, with the pair both sharing photos of each other on Instagram at the time. 
Claudia posted a snap of the two of them smiling together and cosying up side-by-side at the after-party, simply captioned: 'what an honor.' [sic] 
On the same day, Cristiano shared a picture of him with Claudia, along with a host of models, writing alongside it: 'It seems the launch of my perfume went very well...!' 
Cristiano is newly-single following his split from Russian model Irina Shayk, who's now dating actor Bradley Cooper, earlier this year following a five-year relationship. 
He has full custody of his five-year-son Cristiano, who was born in the US, never publicly naming the identity of the mother. 
Meanwhile, Ronaldo has been released from the Portugal squad by manager Fernando Santos after helping his team secure their qualification for next summer's Euro 2016 tournament. 
Credit: Daily Mail
